quests.question: Why is education important?
quests.sampleAnswer: It opens up new opportunities and builds knowledge.

quests.question: What is your favorite hobby and why?
quests.sampleAnswer: I enjoy reading because it takes me to different worlds.

quests.question: How can we help the environment?
quests.sampleAnswer: We can reduce waste, recycle, and use public transport.

quests.question: What makes a good friend?
quests.sampleAnswer: A good friend is loyal, supportive, and honest.

quests.question: Why is exercise important?
quests.sampleAnswer: Exercise keeps our body healthy and reduces stress.

quests.question: What would you do with a million dollars?
quests.sampleAnswer: I would invest in education and help my community.

quests.question: How has technology changed our lives?
quests.sampleAnswer: Technology has made communication faster and information more accessible.

quests.question: What is the best way to learn a new language?
quests.sampleAnswer: Practice daily, watch shows, and speak with native speakers.
